pullRequest.title: Merge feat warnings into feature branch
pullRequest.bodyText:
Pull Request template
Link to github issue (if applicable):



If nothing above, what is your reason for this pull request:



Changes proposed in this pull request:

commit.message: refactor: Create AlertFieldStatus to track severity levels of AlertFieldExceptions
refactor: Update ValidationResult to have a collection of warnings in addition to errors
style: Add comment for method to be deleted after refactor

nodes.bodyText: Since these constructors are private, we only need this constructor. The static methods that construct this object can pass in empty lists as needed.
Should we be adding warnings to the fieldErrors?

commit.message: refactor: Remove single argument constructor for ValidationResult
